title: Software Developer
intro: I am a new graduate in the tech field, with a business and accounting background. Through the combination of my passion for technology and my interest in the world of business, I embarked on a journey to further my education in Computer Science. During my time at school, I delved into all aspects of software development from ideation, creating modular, clean code to writing tests.

My education in business provided me with a solid foundation in areas such as finance, accounting, marketing, and project management. This knowledge, combined with my technical skills, equips me with a unique perspective to bridge the gap between technology and business needs.

During my time as a student, I actively sought opportunities to apply my knowledge in practical settings. I engaged in projects that involved proposing and creating applications for companies. These experiences have sharpened my problem-solving abilities and nurtured my ability to think critically in complex situations.

Beyond my academic achievements, I am an enthusiastic collaborator and a dedicated team player. I thrive in collaborative environments where diverse perspectives come together to achieve common goals. I strongly believe that combining technical expertise with effective communication and interpersonal skills leads to successful outcomes.
As I move on the next phase of my journey, I am excited about the possibilities that lie ahead. I am eager to contribute my knowledge and skills to make an impact.

Thank you for taking the time to learn a bit about me. I am enthusiastic about connecting with professionals and organizations that share my passion and I look forward to the exciting opportunities that await me!
